definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: To use electromagnetic force, the fluid being pumped must be a good electrical conductor.
sentences.chinese: 爲了利用電磁力，被抽送的流體必須爲優良的導電體。

sentences.english: Some maverick scientists believe that both gravity and light are electromagnetic forces.
sentences.chinese: 某些獨立研究科學家們認爲，重力和光都是電磁力。

sentences.english: The results successfully showed that this micro-forming device can process better quality and high accuracy parts.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明電磁力微成形裝置的成形質量較好，精度高。

sentences.english: This force is not the universal gravity but electromagnetic force.
sentences.chinese: 此引力並非萬有引力，而是電磁力。

sentences.english: For instance, the electromagnetic force can be described quantum-mechanically by the motion of photons.
sentences.chinese: 比如，電磁力可以量子力學的方式描述爲光子的運動。

sentences.english: Then, the centrifugal force will be the electromagnetic force.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，這個向心力就只能是由電磁力提供的了。
